extDescription.message: Extract website UI/design rules for AI coding.

popupSubtitle.message: Extract design rules for AI coding

previewSelectRun.message: Select a run to see spec preview

previewEmpty.message: No spec data yet. Click 'Capture Snapshot' to extract.

errContentScriptMissing.message: Content script not available on this page.

optionsFooter.message: UiToAi runs locally. No cloud sync.

promptInstructionsLine.message: Use this spec to replicate the design system. Follow this order:

promptStep1.message: 1. **Design Tokens** - Set up colors, typography, spacing, shadows from `spec.designTokens`

promptStep2.message: 2. **Layout** - Configure breakpoints and container widths from `spec.layoutRules`

promptStep4.message: 4. **Accessibility** - Ensure focus rings and ARIA patterns from `spec.a11ySpec`

promptStep5.message: 5. **Components** - Build components matching the catalog patterns

promptFooter.message: *Use spec.json as the source of truth for all design decisions.*

featureIntro.message: UiToAi is a powerful Chrome extension that extracts UI design specifications from any website, helping AI coding tools replicate designs more accurately.

featureSnapshotDesc.message: Extract comprehensive design specifications from the entire page

featureSnapshotItems.message:
‚Ä¢ **Design Tokens**: Colors, typography, spacing, border-radius, shadows, z-index
‚Ä¢ **Layout Rules**: Responsive breakpoints, container widths, grid systems
‚Ä¢ **Motion Specs**: Transition animations, keyframes, duration and easing functions
‚Ä¢ **Accessibility**: Heading structure, ARIA usage statistics
‚Ä¢ **Engineering Fingerprint**: Framework detection (React/Vue/Angular), CSS architecture patterns

featureSnapshotUse.message: Best for: Design system analysis, style guide creation, comprehensive design documentation

featureElementDesc.message: Select specific UI components for detailed code extraction

featureElementItems.message:
‚Ä¢ **HTML Structure**: Complete component HTML code
‚Ä¢ **Computed Styles**: Actual CSS property values
‚Ä¢ **Tailwind Conversion**: Intelligent generation of corresponding Tailwind classes
‚Ä¢ **Element Dimensions**: Position, size and geometric information
‚Ä¢ **Text Preview**: Element's text content

featureElementUse.message: Best for: Component implementation, code reference, specific UI element replication

featurePageDesc.message: Capture complete page structure and base information

featurePageItems.message:
‚Ä¢ **Complete HTML**: Full page source code
‚Ä¢ **Page Information**: URL, title and metadata
‚Ä¢ **Google Fonts**: Font links and imports
‚Ä¢ **Page Overview**: Comprehensive page-level data

featurePageUse.message: Best for: Page migration, complete reconstruction, full-page reference

workflowDesignSteps.message: Start Run ‚Üí Capture Snapshot ‚Üí Export for AI ‚Üí Get complete design specifications

workflowComponentSteps.message: Start Run ‚Üí Pick Element ‚Üí Select key components ‚Üí Export for AI ‚Üí Get component code

workflowPageSteps.message: Start Run ‚Üí Pick Element ‚Üí Pick page ‚Üí Export for AI ‚Üí Get complete page code

dataDescription.message: All data is exported to an AI-friendly folder structure in your Downloads folder

dataFiles.message:
‚Ä¢ **ai/spec.json**: Complete design specification data (source of truth)
‚Ä¢ **ai/prompt.md**: AI-optimized prompt with design guidelines
‚Ä¢ **samples/elements.json**: Captured element samples and code snippets

privacyLocal.message:
‚Ä¢ **100% Local Processing**: All data is processed locally, no cloud uploads
‚Ä¢ **No Data Collection**: We don't collect or store any of your data
‚Ä¢ **Optional Sanitization**: Remove sensitive text content before export
‚Ä¢ **Sample Control**: Limit the amount of data collected

tips1.message: ‚Ä¢ **Best Practice**: Start with Capture Snapshot for design context, then use Pick Element for specific components

tips2.message: ‚Ä¢ **Multiple Pages**: Capture different pages to build comprehensive design systems

tips3.message: ‚Ä¢ **Quality**: Wait for pages to fully load before capturing for best results

tips4.message: ‚Ä¢ **AI Ready**: Exported data is optimized for Cursor, Windsurf, and other AI coding tools
